title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Anniversary Ride – Wilson, Wyoming
content:
Photo submitted by Tim Young, “Photo of a ride today in Wilson, WY, aboard my 1980 custom Schwinn Paramount, to celebrate the anniversary of rolling out of town 41 years ago with two friends on the Too Tyred Tour, a 7-year Around the World expedition. The bars may be a little low for my old

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Anniversary Ride – Wilson, Wyoming appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
